Synchronously, we sent e-mails to other apheresis centers in the country (n = 22) to ask the accessibility of LA during the pandemic period. Of note, we have been collaborating with these centers for a nationwide registry provided insight into the real-life management of patients with HoFH undergoing LA in Turkey.
3 Information received from other centers revealed that LA was accessible in 61% of the centers. However, most of the patients (75%) were not attending their LA sessions with the fear of getting infected.
